Docs.param: The target Azure resource URI. For example, `/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/qms-test/providers/Microsoft.Batch/batchAccounts/testAccount/`. This is the target Azure resource URI for the List GET operation. If a `{resourceName}` is added after `/quotas`, then it's the target Azure resource URI in the GET operation for the specific resource.

The **Skiptoken** parameter is used only if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a **nextLink** element, its value includes a **skiptoken** parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: For the specified scope, get the current quota requests for a one year period ending at the time is made. Use the **oData** filter to select quota requests.

Thrown when unable to deserialize the response
Thrown when a required parameter is null
